props.name: as
props.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwritten by `asChild`.

props.name: asChild
props.description:
Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.

Read our [Composition](https://akar.vinicunca.dev/core/guides/composition) guide for more details.

props.name: disabled
props.description: When `true`, prevents the user from interacting with the Number Field.

props.name: disableWheelChange
props.description: When `true`, prevents the value from changing on wheel scroll.

props.name: formatOptions
props.description: Formatting options for the value displayed in the number field. This also affects what characters are allowed to be typed by the user.

props.name: invertWheelChange
props.description: When `true`, inverts the direction of the wheel change.

props.name: locale
props.description: The locale to use for formatting dates

props.name: max
props.description: The largest value allowed for the input.

props.name: min
props.description: The smallest value allowed for the input.

props.name: name
props.description: The name of the field. Submitted with its owning form as part of a name/value pair.

props.name: readonly
props.description: When `true`, the Number Field is read-only.

props.name: required
props.description: When `true`, indicates that the user must set the value before the owning form can be submitted.

props.name: step
props.description: The amount that the input value changes with each increment or decrement 'tick'.

props.name: stepSnapping
props.description: When `false`, prevents the value from snapping to the nearest increment of the step value

events.name: update:modelValue
events.description: Event handler called when the value changes.
